verses.text: \w So|strong="H8085"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w left|strong="H4422"\w* Gath \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w took|strong="H3381"\w* refuge \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*. \w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3381"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H3381"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w distressed|strong="H4751"\w* or indebted or \w discontented|strong="H4751"\w* rallied \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w leader|strong="H8269"\w*. \w About|strong="H1961"\w* four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w From|strong="H3318"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* father \w and|strong="H4428"\w* mother stay \f + \fr 22:3 \ft Syriac and Vulgate; Hebrew go forth\f* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w learn|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* God \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w left|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* care \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4686"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H3063"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4686"\w*. \w Depart|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w left|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Hereth|strong="H2802"\w*. Saul Slays the Priests of Nob (Psalms 52:1–9)

\w Soon|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w learned|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w discovered|strong="H3045"\w*. \w At|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tamarisk tree \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hill \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, “\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w*, \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Benjamin! \w Is|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w making|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thousands \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*? \w Not|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w told|strong="H1540"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*. \w Not|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H5650"\w* \w shown|strong="H5973"\w* concern \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w has|strong="H5650"\w* \w stirred|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* lie \w in|strong="H5921"\w* wait \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w case|strong="H3588"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Edomite, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H7586"\w* \w stationed|strong="H5324"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*: “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w come|strong="H7586"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Ahimelech \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nob|strong="H5011"\w*.

Ahimelech \w inquired|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w provisions|strong="H6720"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Goliath|strong="H1555"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* messengers \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w summon|strong="H7121"\w* Ahimelech \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w Nob|strong="H5011"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w came|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

“\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub,” \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*. “\w Here|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w*, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* lord,” \w he|strong="H2005"\w* replied.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*? \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w inquired|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w lie|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* wait, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* doing \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.”

Ahimelech \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w as|strong="H1004"\w* faithful \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w son-in-law|strong="H2860"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* captain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* bodyguard \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w honored|strong="H3513"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?

\w Was|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w inquired|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w*? \w Far|strong="H2486"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*! \w Let|strong="H7760"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w accuse|strong="H7592"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w affair|strong="H1697"\w*—\w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* part \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* replied, “\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, Ahimelech, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w ordered|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guards|strong="H7323"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w side|strong="H3027"\w*, “\w Turn|strong="H5437"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w too|strong="H1571"\w* sided \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w fleeing|strong="H1272"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lift|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w strike|strong="H6293"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* ordered \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w turn|strong="H5437"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w strike|strong="H6293"\w* \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*!” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* Edomite \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* struck \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w*. \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w eighty-five|strong="H8084"\w* men \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w wore|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* linen ephod.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w also|strong="H5221"\w* \w put|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w Nob|strong="H5011"\w*, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w its|strong="H5892"\w* men \w and|strong="H3548"\w* women, \w children|strong="H5768"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w infants|strong="H5768"\w*, \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w*, \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*.

But \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahimelech \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*. \w His|strong="H1732"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Abiathar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Abiathar \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w to|strong="H3117"\w* Abiathar, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Edomite \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w sure|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w myself|strong="H5315"\w* am responsible \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*; do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w seeks|strong="H1245"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w* \w mine|strong="H5978"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* well. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w safe|strong="H4931"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.”
